titleStmt.title: Inuentions or deuises Very necessary for all generalles and captaines, or leaders of men, as wel be sea as by land: written by William Bourne. An. 1578.
titleStmt.author: Bourne, William, d. 1583.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed [by T. Orwin] for Thomas VVoodcock dwelling in Paules Churchyard, at the signe of the black Beare,

notesStmt.note: Printer's name from STC; publication date conjectured by STC on basis of title page border.
Running title reads: Rare inuentions and strange deuises.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
